title: 2 BED, 2 BATH IN ROUND ROCK!!
posting_body: LIVE A LIFE OF TRUE LUXURY
If you’ve been searching for a living experience that combines urban sophistication with suburban convenience, look no further!
This brand new resort-style apartment community is the latest Round Rock turn on.
This stylish apartment home features craftsman finishes, modern features, and an open, airy layout.
Embark on culinary adventures in your gourmet kitchen, with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, subway tile backsplashes, and an island for extra prep space.
Spa-inspired bathrooms feature a seamless glass enclosed shower & a relaxing soaking tub.
Unpack gleefully into your oversized closets.
Additional included special features are a built-in work station and full sized washer and dryer.
Outdoor recreation areas include a resort-style swimming pool with cabanas, courtyard kitchen and dining areas, gaming, open-air TV lounge, and a yoga and fitness lawn area.
